mil7.3.2:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘padumassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.3.2:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, padumam udake jatam udake samvaddham anupalittam udakena;
mil7.3.2:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kule gane labhe yase sakkare sammananaya paribhogapaccayesu ca sabbattha anupalittena bhavitabbam.
mil7.3.2:1.4: Idam, maharaja, padumassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.2:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, padumam udaka accuggamma thati;
mil7.3.2:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbalokam abhibhavitva accuggamma lokuttaradhamme thatabbam.
mil7.3.2:2.3: Idam, maharaja, padumassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.2:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, padumam appamattakenapi anilena eritam calati;
mil7.3.2:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena appamattakesupi kilesesu samyamo karaniyo, bhayadassavina viharitabbam.
mil7.3.2:3.3: Idam, maharaja, padumassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.2:3.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena ‘anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu’”ti.
